code: import React from'react';import{Col}from"react-bootstrap";import Card from"react-bootstrap/Card";import star from'../assets/star.png';import{Image}from'react-bootstrap';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{DEVICE_ROUTE}from"../utils/consts";import'../styles/DeviceItem.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const DeviceItem=_ref=>{let{device}=_ref;const history=useNavigate();return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Col,{md:3,className:"mt-3",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Card,{className:"device-card",onClick:()=>history(DEVICE_ROUTE+'/'+device.id),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Image,{height:200,width:200,src:process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL+device.img}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"device-card-info",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"brand-name",children:"samsung"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"device-rating",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"rating-number",children:device.rating}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Image,{src:star,className:"star-icon"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"device-name",children:device.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"price",children:[device.price," \u20BD"]})]})]})});};export default DeviceItem;
